verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֛ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁמוֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king יָרָבְעָ֑ם <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> to reign אֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> began Abijah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> over Judah

שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> He reigned בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> His mother's מִיכָיָ֥הוּ <S%H4322><s%> also [was] Michaiah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אוּרִיאֵ֖ל <S%H222><s%> of Uriel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at גִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1390><s%> of Gibeah וּמִלְחָמָ֥ה <S%H4421><s%> And there was war הָיְתָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> between Abijah וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam

וַיֶּאְסֹ֨ר <S%H631><s%> in array אֲבִיָּ֜ה <S%H29><s%> And Abijah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> the battle בְּחַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> with an army גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> of valiant men מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of war אַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> [even] four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בָּח֑וּר <S%H970><s%> young ס וְיָרָבְעָ֗ם <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam עָרַ֤ךְ <S%H6186><s%> in array עִמּוֹ֙ <S%H5973><s%> set מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> also set the battle בִּשְׁמוֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> against him with eight מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בָּח֖וּר <S%H970><s%> young גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [being] mighty men חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> of valour ס

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> stood up אֲבִיָּ֗ה <S%H29><s%> And Abijah מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> on לְהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount צְמָרַ֔יִם <S%H6787><s%> Zemaraim אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> which [is] in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שְׁמָע֖וּנִי <S%H8085><s%> Hear יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> me thou Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel

הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not לָכֶם֙ לָדַ֔עַת <S%H3045><s%> Ought ye not to know כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave מַמְלָכָ֧ה <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom לְדָוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> to David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever ל֥וֹ וּלְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> [even] to him and to his sons בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> by a covenant מֶֽלַח׃ <S%H4417><s%> salt ס

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> is risen up יָרָבְעָ֣ם <S%H3379><s%> Yet Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָ֔ט <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat עֶ֖בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּמְרֹ֖ד <S%H4775><s%> and hath rebelled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <S%H113><s%> against his lord

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> And there are gathered עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> about אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H582><s%> men רֵקִים֙ <S%H7386><s%> unto him vain בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children בְלִיַּ֔עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial וַיִּֽתְאַמְּצ֖וּ <S%H553><s%> and have strengthened עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> too רְחַבְעָ֣ם <S%H7346><s%> themselves against Rehoboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon וּרְחַבְעָ֗ם <S%H7346><s%> when Rehoboam הָ֤יָה <S%H1961><s%> become נַ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> was young וְרַךְ־ <S%H7390><s%> faint לֵבָ֔ב <S%H3824><s%> heart וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הִתְחַזַּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> and could not withstand לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> them

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> now אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹֽמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> And now ye think לְהִתְחַזֵּק֙ <S%H2388><s%> to withstand לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> accept מַמְלֶ֣כֶת <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> in the hand בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons דָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you הָמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> multitude רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> and ye [be] a great וְעִמָּכֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> with עֶגְלֵ֣י <S%H5695><s%> calves זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> and [there are] with you golden אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> made לָכֶ֛ם יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> which Jeroboam לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> you for gods

הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> of [them that are] no הִדַּחְתֶּם֙ <S%H5080><s%> Have ye not cast out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <S%H3548><s%> the priests יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וַתַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> and have made לָכֶ֤ם כֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> you priests כְּעַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> after the manner of the nations הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> common כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַבָּ֗א <S%H935><s%> comes לְמַלֵּ֨א <S%H4390><s%> accomplish יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> himself בְּפַ֤ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> A young בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> bull וְאֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> rams שִׁבְעָ֔ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> may become כֹהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> [the same] may be a priest לְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> gods ס

וַאֲנַ֛חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> But as for us the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> [is] our God וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not עֲזַבְנֻ֑הוּ <S%H5800><s%> and we have not forsaken וְכֹ֨הֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> him and the priests מְשָׁרְתִ֤ים <S%H8334><s%> which minister לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [are] the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites בַּמְלָֽאכֶת׃ <S%H4399><s%> [wait] upon [their] business

וּמַקְטִרִ֣ים <S%H6999><s%> And they burn לַיהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עֹל֣וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt sacrifices בַּבֹּֽקֶר־ <S%H1242><s%> every morning בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning וּבָעֶֽרֶב־ <S%H6153><s%> and every evening בָּעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> every evening וּקְטֹֽרֶת־ <S%H7004><s%> incense סַמִּים֩ <S%H5561><s%> and sweet וּמַעֲרֶ֨כֶת <S%H4635><s%> row לֶ֜חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַשֻּׁלְחָ֣ן <S%H7979><s%> table הַטָּה֗וֹר <S%H2889><s%> also [set they in order] upon the pure וּמְנוֹרַ֨ת <S%H4501><s%> and the candlestick הַזָּהָ֤ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְנֵרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5216><s%> with the lamps לְבָעֵר֙ <S%H1197><s%> thereof to burn בָּעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> evening בָּעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> every כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁמְרִ֣ים <S%H8104><s%> for we keep אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you עֲזַבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H5800><s%> but ye have forsaken אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> now behold עִמָּ֨נוּ <S%H5973><s%> against בָרֹ֜אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> himself [is] with us for [our] captain הָאֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> And behold God וְכֹהֲנָ֛יו <S%H3548><s%> and his priests וַחֲצֹצְר֥וֹת <S%H2689><s%> trumpets הַתְּרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> with sounding לְהָרִ֣יעַ <S%H7321><s%> to cry alarm עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> against בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against you O children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּלָּֽחֲמ֛וּ <S%H3898><s%> fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> ye not against the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תַצְלִֽיחוּ׃ <S%H6743><s%> for ye shall not prosper

וְיָֽרָבְעָ֗ם <S%H3379><s%> But Jeroboam הֵסֵב֙ <S%H5437><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּאְרָ֔ב <S%H3993><s%> caused an ambushment לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come מֵֽאַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> behind וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> was in לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> them so they were before יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְהַמַּאְרָ֖ב <S%H3993><s%> and the ambushment מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> [was] behind

וַיִּפְנ֣וּ <S%H6437><s%> looked back יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> And when Judah וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold לָהֶ֤ם הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> behold the battle פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> [was] before וְאָח֔וֹר <S%H268><s%> and behind וַֽיִּצְעֲק֖וּ <S%H6817><s%> and they cried לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests [מַחֲצֹצְרִים כ] (מַחְצְרִ֖ים <S%H2690><s%> blow ק) בַּחֲצֹצְרֽוֹת׃ <S%H2689><s%> with the trumpets

וַיָּרִ֖יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> gave a shout אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Then the men יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> A war בְּהָרִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H7321><s%> shouted אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and as the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְהָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> it came to pass that God נָגַ֤ף <S%H5062><s%> smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָֽרָבְעָם֙ <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> Abijah וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> and Judah

וַיָּנ֥וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> fled בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> delivered אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God בְּיָדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> them into their hand

וַיַּכּ֥וּ <S%H5221><s%> slew בָהֶ֛ם אֲבִיָּ֥ה <S%H29><s%> And Abijah וְעַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and his people מַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> them with a great וַיִּפְּל֤וּ <S%H5307><s%> so there fell down חֲלָלִים֙ <S%H2491><s%> slain מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בָּחֽוּר׃ <S%H970><s%> young
